item.description:
February 24th
Must RSVP by February 23rd.

Fun Social Event sponsored by WBOA. Friends are welcome.

6:00 pm - Cocktails (not included)
6:30 pm - Call for Dinner

After the Call for Dinner, you will have the opportunity to introduce yourself. Please share who you are, what you do and an interesting fact, thought or story about yourself. (but, keep it brief so everyone gets a chance)

Don't forget to bring business cards and a pad of paper. You never know what tidbit you might want to jot down.

A great way to CURE CABIN FEVER on a dark and dreary winter's night!

We look forward to seeing you there!

Michelle & Suzanne, Your WBOA Hostesses

$25 - Includes: Salad, Meal, Tax and Tip (What a deal!)
item.name: February 24th Social Dinner - Storrowton Tavern
